key_topics: Integrating various APIs for travel services

guest.name: At least 3 people mentioned (including Marissa, Ferg, Alex). Full names and specific roles not stated
guest.company: Yate Travel (formed during hackathon), Unicorn Mafia (developer group)

summary: A team built an AI travel agent during a hackathon that automates group trip planning, booking flights/hotels, and even handles payments, generating revenue within days.
